description: A badge is a small square or circular component for representing user avatars. These can be in the form of an image, an icon or a two character string (e.g. the user's initials).

props.name: label
props.description: The two character initials to display on the badge.

props.name: image
props.description: URL of the image to display on the badge.

props.name: icon
props.description: An icon to display on the badge.

props.name: circular
props.description: If true, render the badge as a circle, instead of a square.

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the badge - s, m, l, xl, xxl.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the badge. This is one of the provided NeonFunctionalColors.

props.name: alternateColor
props.description: Alternate color for creating gradient badges. NOTE: can also be the same color as 'color'.

props.name: editable
props.description:
Allow editing of the image. This will place an image file lookup button on top of the image allowing the user to
choose a new image to upload.

props.name: accept
props.description: Accept string for the filetype to support selecting.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Display the badge in the disable style

props.name: jazziconId
props.description: Apply the generated Jazzicon style based on the unique identified provided (e.g. a wallet address, name, etc)

props.name: editButtonTitle
props.description: Title for the file upload button in edit mode.

events.name: change-image
events.description:
emitted when the user selects or clears their image in edit mode.
NOTE: This emit event DOES NOT set the badge image, it is the responsibility of the parent component to pass an
image URL back into the component's image property to set it, e.g. a data URI.
